Package kulami.game.board

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    A Board is a representation of the positions of up to 17 panels on a 10 by 10 map.
    BoardParser
    BoardParser is a class that contains static methods to parse the textual representation of a Kulami board used by the Kulami server.
    GameMap
    GameMap represents a board of 17 panels together with its current configuration of marbles.
    Marbles
    A Marbles represents the positions of all marbles on a Board.
    Panel
    A Panel object represents a panel on a Kulami board.
    PanelFour
    A Panel of size 4.
    PanelSix
    A Panel of size 6.
    PanelThree
    A Panel of size 3.
    PanelTwo
    A Panel of size 2.
    Pos
    Pos represents a position on a 10 by 10 Kulami board.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Orientation
    Orientation of a panel.
    Owner
    The owner of a field on the board.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalBoardCode
    Exception that indicates that a board code could not be correctly parsed.
    Panel.PanelNotPlacedException
    Information about a Panel that has not been placed yet was requested.
    Panel.PanelOutOfBoundsException
    There is not enough space for the Panel at the specified position.
    TooManyPanelsException
    Exception that indicates that no more panels of a particular size can be placed on the board.
